I don't know...
I thought that was God. I mean, he had glorious white hair and beard. Unlike what most people say, he doesn't actually wear a tacky white robe.

He was wearing tuxedo, an explorer's outfit, Grim Reaper costume and I think he was a girl once...

It keeps changing in my dream...
